block.p: WEINGARTEN - Edith. Beloved wife of the late Seymour. Loving mother of Merri and Barry Grieff and Ira Weingarten. Cherished grandmother of Jordan and Benjamin. Devoted friend. Past chairperson of Kings Bay Construction Committee. A founder and past vice president of the Public Employees Federation, AFL-CIO. Services today, 10 AM, at Sherman's Flatbush Memorial Chapel, 1283 Coney Island Avenue (Ave. J).
